languages.text: {n}Мученик надрывно дышит, словно сама мысль вызывает в нем ужас.{/n} "Нет!... Меня лишили... благодати {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Деус Механикус{/g}... не трать сил... и выслушай мою исповедь..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Мученик надрывно дышит, словно сама мысль вызывает в нем ужас.{/n} "Нет!... Меня лишили... благодати Деус Механикум... не трать сил... и выслушай мою исповедь..."

languages.text: {n}The man gasps violently, as if the very thought terrifies him.{/n} "No! I was robbed... of the grace of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Deus Mechanicus{/g}... waste not your efforts... and hear my confession..."
languages.original_text: {n}Мученик надрывно дышит, словно сама мысль вызывает в нем ужас.{/n} "Нет!... Меня лишили... благодати {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Деус Механикус{/g}... не трать сил... и выслушай мою исповедь..."

traits.locale_text: {n}The man gasps violently, as if the very thought terrifies him.{/n} "No! I was robbed... of the grace of Deus Mechanicus... waste not your efforts... and listen to my confession..."

{n}The man gasps violently, as if the very thought terrifies him.{/n} "No! I was robbed... of the grace of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Deus Mechanicus{/g}... waste not your efforts... and hear my confession..."

languages.text: {n}这个人剧烈地喘息着，似乎这个想法让他感到恐惧。{/n}“不！我已经被剥夺了……{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}万机之神{/g}的恩典……不要再徒劳地努力了……听我忏悔吧……”
languages.original_text: {n}The man gasps violently, as if the very thought terrifies him.{/n} "No! I was robbed... of the grace of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Deus Mechanicus{/g}... waste not your efforts... and hear my confession..."

traits.locale_text: {n}这个人剧烈地喘息着，似乎这个想法让他感到恐惧。{/n}“不！我已经被剥夺了……{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}万机之神{/g}的恩典……不要再徒劳地努力了……听我忏悔吧……”

languages.text: {n}El hombre jadea bruscamente, como si tan solo pensarlo lo horrorizara.{/n} «¡No! Me arrebataron... la gracia del {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Deus Mechanicus{/g}... no malgaste sus esfuerzos... y escuche mi confesión...».
languages.original_text: {n}The man gasps violently, as if the very thought terrifies him.{/n} "No! I was robbed... of the grace of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Deus Mechanicus{/g}... waste not your efforts... and hear my confession..."

traits.locale_text: {n}El hombre jadea bruscamente, como si tan solo pensarlo lo horrorizara.{/n} «¡No! Me arrebataron... la gracia del {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Deus Mechanicus{/g}... no malgaste sus esfuerzos... y escuche mi confesión...».

languages.text: {n}男は考えることすら恐ろしいと言うように、ハッと息を呑んだ。{/n} 「違う！奪われたんだ…{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}デウス・メカニクス{/g}の恩恵を…労力を、無駄にするな…告白を、聞いてくれ…」
languages.original_text: {n}The man gasps violently, as if the very thought terrifies him.{/n} "No! I was robbed... of the grace of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Deus Mechanicus{/g}... waste not your efforts... and hear my confession..."

traits.locale_text: {n}男は考えることすら恐ろしいと言うように、ハッと息を呑んだ。{/n} 「違う！奪われたんだ…{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}デウス・メカニクス{/g}の恩恵を…労力を、無駄にするな…告白を、聞いてくれ…」

languages.text: {n}Der Mann ringt nach Luft, als würde ihm schon der Gedanke Angst machen.{/n} "Nein! Ich wurde ... der Gunst des {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Deus Mechanicus{/g} beraubt ... verschwendet keine Mühe ... und hört meine Beichte ..."
languages.original_text: {n}The man gasps violently, as if the very thought terrifies him.{/n} "No! I was robbed... of the grace of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Deus Mechanicus{/g}... waste not your efforts... and hear my confession..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Mann ringt nach Luft, als würde ihm schon der Gedanke Angst machen.{/n} "Nein! Ich wurde ... der Gunst des {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Deus Mechanicus{/g} beraubt ... verschwendet keine Mühe ... und hört meine Beichte ..."

languages.text: {n}L'homme suffoque violemment, comme si l'idée même le terrifiait.{/n} « Non ! On m'a privé... de la grâce du {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Deus Mechanicus{/g}... ne perdez pas votre temps... et écoutez ma confession... »
languages.original_text: {n}The man gasps violently, as if the very thought terrifies him.{/n} "No! I was robbed... of the grace of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Deus Mechanicus{/g}... waste not your efforts... and hear my confession..."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'homme suffoque violemment, comme si l'idée même le terrifiait.{/n} « Non ! On m'a privé... de la grâce du {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Deus Mechanicus{/g}... ne perdez pas votre temps... et écoutez ma confession... »

languages.text: {n}Adamın soluğu, sanki bu düşünce onu korkutuyormuş gibi bir anda kesiliyor.{/n} "Hayır! {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Deus Mechanicus'un{/g} zarafetinden... Yoksun kaldım... Çabalarını boşa harcama... Günahlarımı dinle..."
languages.original_text: {n}The man gasps violently, as if the very thought terrifies him.{/n} "No! I was robbed... of the grace of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Deus Mechanicus{/g}... waste not your efforts... and hear my confession..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Adam soluğu, sanki bu düşünce onu korkutuyormuş gibi bir anda kesiliyor.{/n} "Hayır! {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Deus Mechanicus{/g}'un zarafetinden... Yoksun kaldım... Çabalarını boşa harcama... Günahlarımı dinle..."
